sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the difference in Chinese agraphia between basal ganglia and cortex damaged patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究基底神經節與皮層損害致漢語失寫症的異同。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features of Chinese agraphia caused by basal ganglia damage.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究基底神經節損害所致漢語失寫症的特點。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relation between the location of brain damage and Chinese agraphia.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解漢語失寫症與腦損害部位的關係。
